channel.title: Need help with dodian. Bug found need to squash it! Help (Involves magic + tele)
channel.description:
Ok so on my server if someone does autocast at the npc, and they tele they still keep casting and getting xp even if they are in yanille.... I need a fix for that couldn't think of a good fix. Suggestions or fix plz
Thanks so much!

item.title: Need help with dodian. Bug found need to squash it! Help (Involves magic + tele)
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Well, I made my own autocasting so I wouldn’t know.
The method should be in client.java. Add an if statement for proper distance…

Read full topic
